title: Elementalist Spell Talisman Schema
description: A spell talisman defines the properties of a spell, and is used to create a spell in the game.

shaping.description: The shaping of the spell talisman. This defines the shape of the spell.

oneOf.title: Projectile spells are cast at a target and travel away from the caster.
Area of Effect spells affect all targets within a specified area.
Cone spells affect all targets within a specified cone.
Line spells affect all targets within a specified line.
Touch spells are cast by touching the target.
On Self spells affect the caster.
Melee spells are cast at a target within melee range.

behavior.description: The behavior of the spell talisman. This defines the behavior of the spell.

oneOf.title: Damage spells deal damage to the target.
Heal spells heal the target.
Buff spells provide a beneficial effect to the target.
Debuff spells provide a detrimental effect to the target.
Utility spells provide a non-damaging effect to the target.
Summon spells summon a creature to fight for the caster.
Polymorph spells change the form of the target.
Teleport spells move the target to a different location.

tier.description: The tier of the spell talisman. This (loosely) defines the power of the spell.

oneOf.title: Tier 0: Mundane
Tier 1: Common
Tier 2: Uncommon
Tier 3: Rare
Tier 4: Epic
Tier 5: Legendary
Tier 6: Mythic
Tier 7 (highest): Divine
Special tier: Unique
oneOf.description: Unique tier should only be used for restricted spells that are unique to a specific character or have other requirements. It cannot be inscribed by the player.

oneOf.title: Special tier: Astral
oneOf.description: Astral tier spells are a step above divine. An astral talisman is not possible in the normal game.
